column1: 46$Condition: Bipolar Depression$3/5/2008 12:06:14 PM$Reviewer: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient) $4$4$4$"Lamictal has worked for me fairly well.  The first 2 months I took it by itself and it made my mood swing uncontrollable but always depressed.  I would begin to cry for no reason.  My doctor put me back on my Celexa 20mg and I've been fine for about 2 years.  I know it is working because every couple of months I decide to just stop taking all my meds!  Lamictal is not the best drug for someone like me because after 5 days without it you have to start all over with 25mg a day for two weeks
column2: 50mg..... until you get back to your level.  My level is 300mg a day so it takes me 6-7 weeks to recover from my mistake.  I experience mania
column3: which I really enjoy

column1: I have also found that Lamictal and Birth Control pills do not mix.  I only take the Birth Control to stop my periods.  I take active pills continuouly.  I do not know if they are working against pregnancy!!!
